an5.254:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of stinginess.
an5.254:4.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
an5.254:4.4: These are the five kinds of stinginess.
an5.254:4.5: These most contemptible of these five kinds of stinginess is stinginess with the teachings.”
